ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lev 51 Selos got me killed!
ygData.msgSnippet: The Lvl 51 spell also has invisibility. Invisibility drops when you fight. Thus, the song drops. This is consistent with how invisibility works. (Also, scale
ygData.messageBody:
The Lvl 51 spell also has invisibility. Invisibility drops when you fight.
Thus, the song drops. This is consistent with how invisibility works.
(Also, scale of wolf, the faster SoW, is specifically designed to
work like invisibility, and not to be used while fighting.)

Windsong keeps Selo's up for when she's fighting and only uses the 51 for
traveling.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 10, 2000 9:05 AM

>Last night, I was tracking and pulling in Trakanons. At first was
>using my Selos drum and out running the mobs thus losing them. So
>I switched to weps and was slow enough but noticed something.

>When you get attacked or attack something, while playing SSoT
>(song of travel), the effect drops immediately. And you have to
>re-key it to get going again. It looks like it will be un-workable
>for fighting mobs if it drops as soon as you key anything else.

>Anyhow, I was trying to pull some named spectre/skell thing who
>had a pet and was getting whacked pretty good so i started to run.
>But with the song dropping and the pet on me, I did not quite make
>it far enough away. I got low health and a random froogie agro'd
>and I died - ugh.
